about_the_game: This is the official soundtrack to A Dance of Fire and Ice, composed and produced by Jade Kim, Hafiz Azman, and other guest artists! It includes the tracks used for the first worlds, plus a few additional tracks from later worlds in the game. Both FLAC and MP3 files are included.
detailed_description: This is the official soundtrack to A Dance of Fire and Ice, composed and produced by Jade Kim, Hafiz Azman, and other guest artists! It includes the tracks used for the first worlds, plus a few additional tracks from later worlds in the game. Both FLAC and MP3 files are included.
